name: RegenHell
description:
Goal: 

Gain 100 Level Points to Regenerate a new Hell Level. Beat as many levels of Hell as you can. You die, you start again.

Controls:

WASD -> Movement

Left Mouse Button -> Shoot

Bar Space -> Jump

K -> Sacrifice Player

Credits:

Art -> bl4ckrose

Programming -> bl4ckrose

Audio -> Andrey Sitkov ( audio assets purchased through Humble Bundle)

Animations -> Adobe Mixamo
